explains: adj. 严厉的；打击沉重的；精疲力尽的
v. 惩罚；折磨（punish 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: punish for v. 处罚，惩罚

sentences.en: There's no mechanism for punishing arms exporters who break the rules.
sentences.cn: 对于违反规定的军火出口商还没有惩罚机制。
父母喜欢惩罚他们的孩子。

sentences.en: I had made him know that I felt he was cruel and I had done it without his punishing me.
sentences.cn: 我让他知道他自己的残忍，并且他也没有惩罚我。
